text.data:
Rush: The Imperial Generals, they're so strong...
This feeling... It's a first for me...[end]
Truce: It's the Granbelos army! We must withdraw![end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x0], the captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad...!![end]

Sauzer: King Kahna... The power of a Dragnar...
So this is the extent of Bahamut's power? It's hardly worthy of a legend.[end]

King Kahna: !!!!
The legend!!! How do you know of it?![end]

Sauzer: Your Majesty...
History will always choose a single person. And then that person will be known as a hero.[end]
King Kahna: What are you scheming? Sauzer![end]
The Holy Dragons shall not awaken! I will not hand over their power to you!![end]
Sauzer: The dragons won't wake up? That's merely because their time of awakening has not come yet! The moment I conquer this world, their time shall begin! And that time begins now![end]

Kahna was destroyed following the battle.
One era ends and a now One begin.[end][end]
